metadata.title: CVE-2024-50137 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:reset: starfive: jh71x0: Fix accessing the empty member on JH7110 SoCdata->asserted will be NULL on JH7110 SoC since commit 82327b127d41("reset: starfive: Add StarFive JH7110 reset driver") was added. Addthe judgment condition to avoid errors when calling reset_control_statuson JH7110 SoC.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
